resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!
Authentication failed, check your email and password or sign up
Not a member? Get registered in Vikings\' YaMBdventure now!
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.
"Are you sure you want to exit the game?"
"If score is entered in the field by mistake, it undoes the action."
"Coins are given as a reward after victory and, also, collected during the game. It can be spent on helps."
"Five ones are inserted in the field '1' in Down or Hand column. (100 coins)"
"Value 30 is inserted in the field 'max' or value 5 in min field 'min' in Hand column(150 coins)"
"Yamb with sixths are inserted in Up or Hand column. (200 coins)"

"Vikings’ YaMBdventure is multiplayer dice game, involving lots of luck, but also a decent amount of strategy and tactics. 
" "You have a possibility of choosing mini or maxi yamb. They differ in number of columns – more columns more difficult game. 
"
"
 Rolling dice 
 " "Player takes turn rolling six dice. After each roll, he chooses which dice (if any) to keep, " "and which to re-roll. The player may re-roll some or all of the dice up to three times on a turn. " "After ends his turn, player scores his best matching result by combining only five dices. 
"
"
 Column down 
 " "In the first column, the order of scoring is from top to bottom. 
"
"
 Column up 
 " "The second column is opposite to the first, the order of scoring is from bottom to top. 
"
"
 Free column 
 " "In the third column, you can score in any order. 
"
"
 Column "H" 
 " "In the fourth column you can score only after your first roll of dices. 
"
"
 Column from center 
 " "In the fifth column you can score from field max to the top and from the field min to the bottom of column. 
"
"
 Column from beging and end 
 " "In the sixth column you can score from top to the field max and from bottom to field min. 
"
"
 Rows "1", "2", "3", "4", "5" and "6"
 " "First six rows are simple combinations - 1, 2, 3, etc. Score is the sum of all ones, twos, threes, etc., depends what you are collecting. 
"

" = 4 points 
" "
 First sum row 
 " "In this row you score the sum of the first six rows. If the sum is greater than 60, you will be awarded with 30 bonus points. 
"
"
 Max row 
 " "The aim of this row is to score as much as possible points. 
"

" = 27 points 
" "
 Min row 
 " "The aim of this row is to score as less as possible points. 
"

" = 8 points 
" "
 Min-max sum row 
 " "The sum in this row is calculated by the formula (Max - Min) x (number of ones in first row)." "From examples above it is (27 - 8) x 4 = 19 x 4 = 76. 
"
"
 "S" - Straight row 
 " "Combinations 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 or 2, 3, 4, 5, 6. If you get one of these combinations by rolling all dice at once – the score is 66. " "If you keep some of the dice, and some of them roll again – the score is 56. And if you roll some of the dice three times, the score is 46. 
"

"
 "T" - Three of the kind 
 " "3 equal dice. For each Poker you will be awarded with 20 bonus points. 
"

" = 15 + 20 = 35 points 
" "
 "F" - Full house row 
 " "Combinations of 3 equal dice and other 2 equal dice. For each Full House you will be awarded with 30 bonus points. 
"

" = 28 + 30 = 58 points 
" "
 "P" - Poker row 
 " "4 equal dice. For each Poker you will be awarded with 40 bonus points. 
"

" = 16 + 40 = 56 points 
" "
 "Y" - Yamb row 
 " "This is the most valuable field in the game. You need to collect 5 equal dices. For each Yamb you will be awarded with 50 bonus points.
"

" = 30 + 50 = 80 points 
" "
 Third sum column 
 " "The sum of the previous 4 rows (S + F + P + Y). 
"
